DOC.brief_summary: This is a randomized, inpatient, ascending multiple dose study to assess safety and tolerability of SLV-313 SR tablets administered orally to subjects with schizophrenia and schizoaffective disorder.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Multiple Ascending Dose in Schizophrenia Patients
DOC.criteria: Men, aged 1850 years old Women, aged 1850 years old Nonlactating women, aged 1850 years old Nonpregnant women, aged 1850 years old
